mapper.insert: insert into dailydatastatistics (id, uuid, dailyVisterNum, dailyVisterAddNum, svipUserAddNum, vipUserAddNum, payNum, payPersonNum, arppu, arpu, aru, implDate, state, beanIncome) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dailyvisternum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dailyvisteraddnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{svipuseraddnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vipuseraddnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{paynum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{paypersonnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{arppu,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{arpu,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{aru,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{impldate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{beanincome,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update dailydatastatistics
uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dailyVisterNum = #{dailyvisternum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dailyVisterAddNum = #{dailyvisteraddnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
svipUserAddNum = #{svipuseraddnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
vipUserAddNum = #{vipuseraddnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
payNum = #{paynum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
payPersonNum = #{paypersonnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
arppu = #{arppu,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
arpu = #{arpu,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
aru = #{aru,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
implDate = #{impldate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
beanIncome = #{beanincome,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update dailydatastatistics set uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dailyVisterNum = #{dailyvisternum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dailyVisterAddNum = #{dailyvisteraddnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, svipUserAddNum = #{svipuseraddnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, vipUserAddNum = #{vipuseraddnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, payNum = #{paynum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, payPersonNum = #{paypersonnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, arppu = #{arppu,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, arpu = #{arpu,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, aru = #{aru,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, implDate = #{impldate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, beanIncome = #{beanincome,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM DailyDataStatistics ORDER BY implDate DESC

SELECT DISTINCT c.datelist AS propertiesName,IF(d.dailyvisteraddnum IS NULL , 0, d.dailyvisteraddnum) AS propertiesValue FROM DailyDataStatistics AS d RIGHT JOIN Calendar as c ON d.implDate = c.datelist WHERE c.datelist BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ORDER BY c.datelist DESC

SELECT DISTINCT c.datelist AS propertiesName,IF(d.beanIncome IS NULL , 0, d.beanIncome) AS propertiesValue FROM DailyDataStatistics AS d RIGHT JOIN Calendar as c ON d.implDate = c.datelist WHERE c.datelist BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ORDER BY c.datelist DESC

SELECT DISTINCT c.datelist AS propertiesName,IF(d.dailyvisternum IS NULL , 0, d.dailyvisternum) AS propertiesValue FROM DailyDataStatistics AS d RIGHT JOIN Calendar as c ON d.implDate = c.datelist WHERE c.datelist BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ORDER BY c.datelist DESC
